Ce qui fait peur, c'est la manière dont les relations évoluent et comment Catherine Deneuve ne supporte plus de toucher ou d'embrasser son amant quand il devient trop vieux.
What's scary about it is the disposability of relationships and how Catherine Deneuve as soon as her lover becomes too old, she can't even bear to touch him or kiss him.
